channel.title: NPC Keep walking 718 Please help REP++
channel.description: I have tried many things and many tutorials but nothing will work. My problem is that I will set some NPC's to a location, and I want them to not move, but I can't seem to get it to work. Things I have tried: - I went into the NPCSpawning.java and set everything to false, example: World.spawnNPC(659, new WorldTile(3160, 3489, 0), -1, false, false); - I went into the NPC.java and set all the RandomWalks to false, example: if(id == 659) setRandomWalk(false); - I also went into the unpackedSpawnsList.txt and added all the coords, etc. Is there anything I need to do or didn't do? Help would be appreciated and will be rewarded with a rep++ Thanks.

item.title: NPC Keep walking 718 Please help REP++
item.dc:creator: @uiotube uiotube
item.description:
@uiotube wrote:

I have tried many things and many tutorials but nothing will work.
My problem is that I will set some NPC’s to a location, and I want them to not move, but I can’t seem to get it to work.
Things I have tried:

  • I went into the NPCSpawning.java and set everything to false, example: World.spawnNPC(659, new WorldTile(3160, 3489, 0), -1, false, false);
  • I went into the NPC.java and set all the RandomWalks to false, example: if(id == 659) setRandomWalk(false);
  • I also went into the unpackedSpawnsList.txt and added all the coords, etc.
    Is there anything I need to do or didn’t do? Help would be appreciated and will be rewarded with a rep++
    Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: NPC Keep walking 718 Please help REP++
